It would be helpful if you could provide a set of steps that reliably shows the

Moving to Text component based on the stack trace.

Which build?

Tom, you changed stuff in that area of the content assist recently. Might it be
possible that the focus listener isn't unregistered correctly? It seems that
uninstall has been called (since the subject control is null)

Strange that the closer would get a focusLost message after having been
uninstalled as listener. The event handler for focusLost should use the cached
references to get the display anyhow, though.

Fixed > 20040107
